meanings.definition: The practice of photographing celestial objects and phenomena.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy looking at astrophotographies of the stars and planets.
meanings.sent2: Her astrophotographies of the night sky are truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The astrophotographies in the magazine made me want to reach for the stars.
meanings.sent4: His collection of astrophotographies was like a window to the universe.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of astrophotographies always leaves me in awe.

meanings.definition: A collection of photographs of stars, planets, and other astronomical subjects.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed an impressive exhibit of astrophotographies.
meanings.sent2: She shared her astrophotographies with us, showcasing the wonders of space.
meanings.sent3: I dream of having a room filled with astrophotographies hanging on the walls.
meanings.sent4: His astrophotographies were like a treasure trove of cosmic wonders.
meanings.sent5: The book was filled with colorful astrophotographies that sparked my imagination.
